title: 2 patches later and WW death sounds are still borked
body: title.  Insanely loud, not WW actual death sounds.

replies.body:
I hope they fix the very low dance SFX volume of Dragontrainer Heimerdinger, Battlecast Cho'Gath and Infernal Nasus too.

Damn thing's barely audible, and completely muted with anything else going on on the screen.
BUT WE ARE TOO BUSY THROWING BUFF/NERF DARTS WHILE DRUNK ON THE BOARD AND BUSY MAKING SKINS FOR BIG BOOBY/TWINK CHAMPIONS....

> [{quoted}](name=AronCartman,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=5itvdGnH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-22T01:42:38.193+0000)
>
> BUT WE ARE TOO BUSY THROWING BUFF/NERF DARTS WHILE DRUNK ON THE BOARD AND BUSY MAKING SKINS FOR BIG BOOBY/TWINK CHAMPIONS....

I'm a twink.
Yeah i don't play with headphones if someone picks WW.

It is fairly easy to fix, I think they are just either lazy or just don't give a damn about it. Even on 10% master volume, and every volume on 10%, the WW death sounds like a FUCKIN SPEAKER AT MY EAR.

>2 patches later and WW death sounds are still borked

How exactly does a sound get {{item:3153}} ed hmm

Thank god it's not Ahri's death sound
especially for Korean players

Japanese Ahri is worse - I mean better. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
https://youtu.be/YJa1w6ey93s?t=14

...Some say, the voice artist brought a suspiscious-looking toy with her on the recording day.

_Someone had to be helping her with that performance..._
